Notes: HSPA+ is widely deployed. Revision 11 of the 3GPP states that HSPA+ is expected to have a throughput capacity of 672 Mbit/s.
LTE-Advanced update expected to offer peak rates up to 1 Gbit/s fixed speeds and 100 Mb/s to mobile users.
With 2x2 MIMO.Enhanced with 20 MHz channels in 802.16-2009[9]

Primary Use: Mobile Internet mobility up to 200 mph (350 km/h)
Notes: Mobile range 30 km (18 miles) extended range 55 km (34 miles)

Upstream (Mbit/s): Antenna, RF front end enhancements and minor protocol timer tweaks have helped deploy long range P2P networks compromising on radial coverage, throughput and/or spectra efficiency (310 km & 382 km)

Notes: Cell Radius: 3–12 km Speed: 250 km/h Spectral Efficiency: 13 bits/s/Hz/cell Spectrum Reuse Factor: "1"

Common Name: EV-DO Rel. 0 EV-DO Rev.A EV-DO Rev.B
